patterns: tell me about NESA.
What is about NESA in full word?
responses: National Examination and School Inspection Authority

patterns: Tell me a joke!
Tell me something funny!
Do you know a joke?
responses: Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.

how can i find Online Services?

How do you get Online Services?
Guide me to Online Services?
responses: you can use this link https://smser.benax.rw/services/nesa/?service=home for more info.

patterns: give me the responsibilities of NESA?
how to get the responsibilities of NESA?
Where to find the responsibilities of NESA?
What are the responsabilities of nesa?
responses: To set standards for accreditation of private basic education schools and TVET schools from level one (1) to five (5)
To monitor the implementation of norms and standards in public, Government subsidized and private basic education and TVET schools from level one (1) to five (5
To ensure the quality of education in public, Government subsidized and private basic education and TVET schools from level one (1) to five (5)
To prepare, conduct and mark national examinations
To publish national examinations results;
To orient students of primary and ordinary level schools who passed the national examinations

patterns: show me the ppower of NESA
how to find the power of NESA?
how to get the power of NESA?
Where to find the power of NESA?
Guide me to the power of NESA
responses: award certificate to students who passed national examinations for basic education and level five (5) of TVET
grant accreditation to a private basic education school or a TVET school of level one (1) to five (5)
authorize a workplace to offer TVET trainings and certificate not more than level five (5)
suspend or close a school offering basic education or a TVET school of level one (1) to five (5) when considered necessary
equate and provide equivalence of certificates and degrees awarded by foreign schools offering basic education and TVET levels from level one (1) to five (5).

responses: Email: info@nesa.gov.rw
Twitter: @NESA_Rwanda

Toll free: 9070

patterns: give me the departments of NESA?
how to get the department of nesa?
how can i find the department of nesa?
Wheret to get the department of nesa?
What is the link to the department of nesa?
responses: 1.Basic Education and TVET Examination Department
2.Basic Education and TVET Quality Assurance Department

patterns: give me the mission of NESA.
how to get the mission of NESA
how can i find the mission of NESA
Where to get the mission of NESA?
Guide me to the mission of NESA
responses: Mission: The primary of NESA is to ensure quality of education in basic education and Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) from level one (1) to five (5) and to regulate the comprehensive assessments of students and national examinations

patterns: Who is a general director of NESA?
general director of NESA?
tell me the general director of NESA?
responses: General director of NESA: Dr Bernard BAHATI
Head of the Department for Basic Education and TVET Quality Assurance: Mr. KAVUTSE Vianney Augustine
Ag. Head of Basic Education & TVET Examination Department: Mr. KANAMUGIRE Camille
Division Manager of BE and TVET Quality Standards: Mrs. BONEZA Angelique
